{{Form}} [[Rationale::This form is used to edit the information of rm uploads.]] [[Category:Form]] __NORICHEDITOR__ {{{info|page name=RMUploadPage}}} {{{for template|RMUpload|label=Meta information|collapsible}}} {| width="100%" align="center" |- | width="30%" | | width="70%" | |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Uploaded by*: | {{{field|Uploader|mandatory|input type=haloACtext|constraints=ask: [[Category:User]]|default=current user|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the uploader.) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Copyright by: | {{{field|CopyrightBy|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the User/company who holds the rights of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Creation date: | {{{field|CreationDate|input type=date|default=now}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The date when this file has been created or recently changed) |- | style="display: none; " | {{{field|UploadDate|input type=date|mandatory|default=now}}} |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Short description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|rows=3|cols=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can enter a short description of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Keywords: | {{{field|Keywords|multiple|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can tag the file with different keywords) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Related articles: | {{{field|RelatedArticles|input type=haloACtext|constraints=namespace:0|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Articles which are attached to this file) |- | {{{field|Filename|hidden}}} |- | style="color: red; " colspan="2" | Fields marked with a "*" are mandatory |} {{{end template}}} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

<noinclude>{{Template}}

[[Rationale::This template displays information of media (i.e. document, image, etc) in a box.]]
[[Category:Template]]
</noinclude><includeonly>{| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" class="rmMetadataTable"
! colspan="2" class="rmMetadataTH" | ''{{{Media subcategory|}}} Metadata''
|-
| valign="top" | Filename:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{Filename|}}}|[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Copyright by:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{CopyrightBy|}}}|[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Creation date:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{CreationDate|}}}|[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Uploaded by:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{Uploader|}}}|[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Upload date:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{UploadDate|}}}|[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Description:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{Description|}}}|[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Keyword(s):
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{Keywords|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]}}|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Format:
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{Format|}}}|[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]]|undefined}}
|-
| valign="top" | Related article(s):
| valign="top" | {{#if:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticle::x]]}}|undefined}}
|-
{{#ifeq:{{lc:{{NAMESPACE}}}}|document|
{{!}} valign="top" {{!}} Subsection of:
{{!}} valign="top" {{!}} {{#if:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]}}|undefined}} }}
|}</includeonly><noinclude>

{{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}}

{{Content hash|value=}}

</noinclude>

{{Template}} [[Rationale::This template lists all media which has been uploaded and attached to a particular article.]] [[Category:Template]]
{{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{RMListOuterTable}}|}}
{{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

{{Template}} [[Rationale::Template that builds the outer table for the Rich Media list.]] [[Category:Template]] {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" class="rmListTable" |- ! class="rmListInfoText" colspan="6" |Attached documents, images and media |} {| class="sortable rmListTable" cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="margin:0;" |- ! class="rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Category ! class="rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Filename ! class="rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Uploaded by ! class="rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Creation date ! class="unsortable rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Metainformation ! class="unsortable rmListInnerTableHeaderItem" |Delete |- {{#ask: [[Category:Media]][[HasRelatedArticle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | ?HasFilename | ?HasUploader | ?HasCreationDate | format=template | template=RMListInnerTable | link=none | limit=250 }} |} {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" class="rmListTable" |- | colspan="2" | Manually refresh list: [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=purge}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_refresh_icon_16x16.gif] | class="rmListButton" | {{#rmf: {{FULLPAGENAME}} }} |- ! class="rmListTableEnding" colspan="6" | |} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

{{Form}} [[Rationale::This form is used to edit the information of uploaded VCards.]] [[Category:Form]] __NORICHEDITOR__ {{{info|WYSIWYG}}} {{{for template|RMVCard|label=Meta information|collapsible}}} {| width="100%" align="center" |- | width="30%" | | width="70%" | |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Filename*: | {{{field|Filename|mandatory}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The full name of this file including the namespace and its extension) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Copyright by: | {{{field|CopyrightBy}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the user/company who holds the rights of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Creation date: | {{{field|CreationDate|input type=date|mandatory|default=now}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The date when this file has been created or recently changed) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Uploaded by*: | {{{field|Uploader|mandatory|size=40|input type=haloACtext|constraints=aks: [[Category:User]]|default=current user}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the uploader.) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Upload date*: | {{{field|UploadDate|input type=date|default=now}}} |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Short description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|rows=3|cols=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can enter a short description of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Keywords: | {{{field|Keywords|multiple|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can tag the file with different keywords) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Format: | {{{field|Format|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The MIME type of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Related articles: | {{{field|RelatedArticles|input type=haloACtext|constraints=namespace:0|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Articles which are attached to this file) |- | align="center" style="color: red; " colspan="2" | Fields marked with a "*" are mandatory |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

{{Template}} [[Rationale::Used for formatting and annotating uploaded iCalendar files (which come into the wiki e.g. via file upload or email import with file attachment).]] [[Category:Template]] {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 30%;" |- ! style="background: rgb(174, 229, 219) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | [[Image:Calendar.gif|link=]]iCalendar Data |- {{#if:{{{icTitle|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Title: |Value={{{icTitle|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{start|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Start date: |Value={{{start|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{end|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=End date: |Value={{{end|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organizer|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organizer: |Value={{{organizer|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organizerName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organizer name: |Value={{{organizerName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{attendee|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Attendee(s): |Value={{{attendee|}}}}}|}}{{#vardefine:eventParticipants|{{#extractEmailID:{{#replace:{{{organizer|}}}, {{{attendee|}}}|,|;}}|Mbox}}}} |- {{#if:{{{attendeeName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Attendee(s) name(s): |Value={{{attendeeName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{location|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Location: |Value={{{location|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{categories|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Categories: |Value={{{categories|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{description|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Description: |Value={{{description|}}}}}|}} |- |} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

{{Template}} [[Rationale::Used for formatting and annotating uploaded vCard files (which come into the wiki e.g. via file upload or email import with file attachment).]] [[Category:Template]] {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 30%;" |- ! style="background: rgb(174, 213, 219) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | [[Image:vcard.gif|link=]]vCard Data |- {{#if:{{{name|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Name: |Value={{{name|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{title|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Title: |Value={{{title|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organization|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organization: |Value={{{organization|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{nickName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Nickname: |Value={{{nickName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{phone|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Phone: |Value={{{phone|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{address|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Address: |Value={{{address|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{email|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Email: |Value={{{email|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{homepage|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Homepage: |Value={{{homepage|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{birthday|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Birthday: |Value={{{birthday|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{categories|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Categories: |Value={{{categories|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{note|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Note: |Value={{{note|}}}}}|}} |- |} {{#ifexist:{{#extractEmailID: {{{email}}} | Mbox }} | [[HasRelatedArticle::{{#extractEmailID: {{{email}}} | Mbox }}| ]] | [[HasRelatedArticle::{{{name|}}}| ]] }} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}} {{Content hash|value=}}

{{Content bundle}}[[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH| ]][[Maintainer::ontoprise GmbH| ]][[Ontology version::152| ]][[Installation dir::extensions/RichMedia| ]] [[Help Url::http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Rich_Media_Extension | ]] ;dependencies :[[Dependency::semanticforms;212;212]] :[[Dependency::Smwplus;156;156]] ;License :[[License::GPL v2| ]] [[Rationale::This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary for the Rich Media extension.| ]] ;This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary for the Rich Media extension. With the RichMedia Extension you can let the system generate a list of related media (images, documents, pdf, audio and video) to every article. ;How to use Simply add the template call {{RMList|show=True}} at the place you want the list to appear (usually the bottom of the page). ;Sandbox We have created a small [[Richmedia_Sandbox|Sandbox of the RichMedia extension]] in this Wiki to give you a smooth start. ;User manual More information about the RichMedia extension and how to use it can be found in our [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Rich_Media_Extension Rich Media extension help article at SMWForum]. ;This bundle contains these articles : {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- |source=wiki }} [[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]] {{Content hash|value=}} {{Part of bundle|value=Richmedia}}
